member.name: T:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.CardsController
member.summary: REST API controller for card operations

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.CardsController.#ctor(UnisonRestAdapter.Services.IUnisonService,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.CardsController})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CardsController
member.param: Service for communicating with the SOAP backend

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.CardsController.UpdateCard(UnisonRestAdapter.Models.Request.UpdateCardRequest)
member.summary: Updates card information
member.param: Card update request containing the card information to be updated
member.returns: Update result indicating success or failure with details
member.response: Card updated successfully
Invalid request data or update failed
Unauthorized - Unison-Token header missing or invalid

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.CardsController.UpdateCardPost(UnisonRestAdapter.Models.Request.UpdateCardRequest)
member.summary: Updates card information - Alternative route for compatibility

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.CardsController.GetCard(System.String)
member.summary: Gets card information by card ID
member.param: Card identifier to retrieve information for
member.returns: Card information if found, otherwise not found response
member.response: Card information retrieved successfully
Card not found
Unauthorized - Unison-Token header missing or invalid
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET /api/cards/CARD123
Requires Unison-Token header with valid authentication token.

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.CardsController.ValidateCard(UnisonRestAdapter.Models.Request.CardValidationRequest)
member.summary: Validates card information
member.returns: Validation result with card status information
member.response: Card validation completed
Invalid request data or validation failed
Unauthorized - Unison-Token header missing or invalid

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.CardsController.ActivateCard(UnisonRestAdapter.Models.Request.CardActivationRequest)
member.summary: Activates a card
member.response: Card activated successfully
Invalid request data or activation failed
Unauthorized - Unison-Token header missing or invalid

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.CardsController.DeactivateCard(UnisonRestAdapter.Models.Request.CardActivationRequest)
member.summary: Deactivates a card
member.response: Card deactivated successfully
Invalid request data or deactivation failed
Unauthorized - Unison-Token header missing or invalid

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.CardsController.GetCardStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Gets card status by card ID
member.param: Card identifier to get status for
member.response: Card status retrieved successfully
Card not found
Unauthorized - Unison-Token header missing or invalid
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET /api/cards/status/CARD123
Requires Unison-Token header with valid authentication token.

member.name: T:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.HealthController
member.summary: REST API controller for health check and monitoring operations Enhanced for TASK-005: Setup Continuous Endpoint Monitoring

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.HealthController.#ctor(UnisonRestAdapter.Services.IUnisonService,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.HealthController})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the HealthController
member.param: Service for communicating with the SOAP backend
Logger for tracking health check operations

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.HealthController.GetHealth
member.summary: Simple health check that doesn't require authentication - for load balancers/monitoring
member.returns: Basic health status including service version and environment
member.response: Service is healthy and operational

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.HealthController.GetDetailedHealth
member.summary: Detailed health check with SOAP service connectivity validation
member.returns: Detailed health status including dependencies and system metrics
member.response: Detailed health information including dependency status
Service unhealthy - one or more dependencies failed
member.remarks:
This endpoint provides comprehensive health information including: - Application status and uptime - Memory usage and system metrics - SOAP service connectivity (if Unison-Token provided) - Configuration validation
Optional Unison-Token header enables SOAP service connectivity testing.

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.HealthController.GetReadiness
member.summary: Readiness probe for Kubernetes/container orchestration

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.HealthController.GetLiveness
member.summary: Liveness probe for Kubernetes/container orchestration

member.name: T:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.MetricsController
member.summary: REST API controller for service metrics

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.MetricsController.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.MetricsController})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MetricsController

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.MetricsController.GetMetrics
member.summary: Gets basic service metrics and statistics
member.returns: Service metrics including uptime, memory usage, and system information
member.response: Metrics retrieved successfully
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET /api/metrics
No authentication required for basic metrics.
Sample response:
{ "service": "UnisonRestAdapter", "version": "1.0.0", "uptime": "2.00:30:45", "environment": "Development", "system": { "processId": 12345, "workingSetMemory": 52428800, "gcTotalMemory": 10485760, "threadCount": 25 }, "timestamp": "2025-09-11T10:00:00Z" }

member.name: T:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.PerformanceController
member.summary: Controller for performance monitoring and statistics

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PerformanceController

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.PerformanceController.GetStatistics
member.summary: Gets current performance statistics

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.PerformanceController.GetHealth
member.summary: Gets system health status with performance metrics

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.PerformanceController.ClearCache(System.String)
member.summary: Clears the response cache
member.param: Optional pattern to match for selective clearing

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.PerformanceController.ForceGarbageCollection
member.summary: Forces garbage collection (use with caution)
member.returns: Memory usage before and after GC

member.name: T:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.SystemController
member.summary: REST API controller for system operations

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.SystemController.#ctor(UnisonRestAdapter.Services.IUnisonService,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.SystemController})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SystemController
member.param: Service for communicating with the SOAP backend

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.SystemController.GetVersion
member.summary: Gets system version information
member.returns: Version information including API and backend versions
member.response: Version information retrieved successfully
Unauthorized - Unison-Token header missing or invalid
Internal server error retrieving version information
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET /api/system/version
Requires Unison-Token header with valid authentication token.
Sample response:
{ "success": true, "message": "Version information retrieved", "apiVersion": "1.0.0", "backendVersion": "Connected", "buildInfo": { "buildDate": "2025-09-11T10:00:00Z", "environment": "Development", "runtimeVersion": "9.0.0" }, "timestamp": "2025-09-11T10:00:00Z" }

member.name: M:UnisonRestAdapter.Controllers.SystemController.Ping
member.summary: Pings the backend service to test connectivity
member.returns: Ping result indicating backend service connectivity status
member.response: Backend service is reachable
Unauthorized - Unison-Token header missing or invalid
Backend service is not reachable
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET /api/system/ping
Requires Unison-Token header with valid authentication token.
Sample response:
{ "success": true, "message": "Backend service is reachable", "timestamp": "2025-09-11T10:00:00Z" }
